content: we will attach forelegs in this round further please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=17m59s attach body to the head using plastic joint insert pin leg into magic_ring of the body and secure it in place with plastic washer please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=18m07s round 9 24sc 24 round 10 10sc 4inc 10sc 28 round 11 10sc 1inc 1sc *2 1sc 1inc *2 10sc 32 round 12 10sc 1sc 1inc 1sc *4 10sc 36 round 13 5sc 1inc *6 42 round 14-20 42sc * 7rnds 42 round 21 5sc 1dec *6 36 insert marker we will attach hind legs in this round further attach forelegs at round 8 marked with contrasting thread insert legs with pins into the body sides symmetrically and secure them with plastic washers from the body inside please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=19m00s start to stuff and stuff as you go round 22 2sc 1dec 2sc *6 30 round 23 3sc 1dec *6 24 attach hind legs at round 21 marked right under forelegs please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=21m09s round 24 1sc 1dec 1sc *6 18 round 25 1sc 1dec *6 12 round 26 6dec 6 close the hole please see pattern tips toyfoxstore etsy com 9 i ll be glad to see you at toyfoxstore etsy com again toyfoxstore etsy com 10
